attributes.action: restricting the engine size of cars new drivers can use to a certain BHP ratio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more and more new drivers are buying cars that are far too powerful for them to drive and the consequences can and have been tragic. this petition is to legally restrict them to a certain size engine for 2 years, as is done with motorbikes, to reduce the amount of inexperienced drivers driving vehicles they simply cannot handle. this will apply to all ages and sexes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
